content: delicate lacy fingerless gloves in light fingering or heavy laceweight yarn using a simple faggoting stitch and picot edges i first designed them as a gift for my goddaughter ghislaine a gifted cellist i particularly wanted the slender lace section to run up the side of the thumb the pattern is written in two sizes but is easily adaptable to suit a variety of hand sizes or yarns they use less than 200 yards and would look lovely in a fluffy cashmere or any alpaca silk and cashmere mix i frequently adapt or improvise patterns but this is the first that i have written up so if you notice any glaring errors or anything that could be clearer please do let me know i am often on ravlery and very happy to answer any queries i hope that you enjoy it
